entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Component Library with www styles, the stylesheets cannot be accessed asp.net app via link tag #52594
  • Browser hangs when @layout is specified in _Imports file in child folder (Blazor-WASM) #52593
  • Add a simple TooManyRequestsResult to provided action object results #52592
  • .NET 8 Blazor WebApp hangs when toggling between pages #52591
  • Build incrementalism doesn't work for JS initializers #52588
    Planning: WebUI
  • Regression: HTTP 401 When refreshing page using MS Entra ID Auth (Blazor - WASM + Server) #52586
    8.0.x
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52585
  • Blazor: Let browser handle hash change #52583
    8.0.x
  • Adding a route to a Blazor component doesn't work with hot reload #52582

Closed

  • Blazor Web App in auto mode cannot be used for website development #52587
  • blazorwasm hosted SingleOrg template is missing #52584
  • Constant loop in scaffolded Login.razor: OnInitializedAsync when using rendermode InteractiveServer at <Routes> level #52481
  • Should not UseAuthentication method check services registration same way as UseAuthorization does? #52505
  • HostFilteringMiddleware. It is returning "The host '{Host}' does not match an allowed host." time to time. #51960
    9.0-preview1
  • Cookies with a blank value are not present in IRequestCookieCollection #52590
  • After updating .NET 7 Blazor server app to .NET 8, deployment to IIS breaks app when in a folder rather than single website #52517
  • Allow Manual/Explicit Route Entries for Blazor `Router` Component #42431
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: json #52558
  • Perf regression: json #52576
  • Blazor Standalone WebAssembly with MSAL Microsoft work accounts does not return JWT (access_token) #40582
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor server DelegatingHandler for http client causing JavaScript error with prerendering disabled #40336
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WebAssembly Auth0 logout fails #40046
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add a setting in ASP.NET Core KeyVault integration package to set or not the precedence over application configuration #18822
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM Lazy Loading with App Bundling #39935
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM AADB2C template fetchdata failed due to The issuer '(null)' is invalid #39401
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor server application on Ubuntu 20.04 cannot find _framework/blazor.server.js #39354
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor PWA Not Able to Install After Publishing on Azure Web Service #39195
    Planning: WebUI
  • >>NET6 Blazor WASM debugging when running in IIS #39125
    Planning: WebUI
  • Having a space in project name for a hosted Blazor WebAssembly project breaks the build #39059
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WebAssembly: make ChangeEventArgs.Value work both ways for the scope of the event handler #38520
    Planning: WebUI
  • dotnet user-secrets list --json outputs invalid json #52247
  • Allow For Inheritance with RouteAttribute #40825
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server .NET 6 No Scroll after clicking an anchor link #40800
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Isolated css: generated attribute placement #43157
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 8.0.x
  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • HeaderDictionaryTypeExtensions not using Dictionary #52551
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
